eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 04:36 PM ON OCT 08, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:37 AM OCT 09, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Safe Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. The Scottsdale Police Department is looking for 69 year old John Manos. John is a white male, 5 feet 11 inches tall, 190 pounds, with gray hair and blue eyes. John was last seen wearing khaki shorts, and a blue golf polo shirt. John was last seen on 10/06/2025 at 4:00 P.M. near 4100 North Drinkwater Blvd., driving a 2012, black, Infiniti, G 37, with the Arizona License plate 5 5 0 KE A. John suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become lost or easily confused. Please contact Scottsdale Police at 480 312 5000 or call 911 with any information. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
